nodes.text: Shimkif was a female Agbui agent of the Grysk Hegemony who accompanied Haplif on his mission to infiltrate the Chiss Ascendancy. Shimkif was the mother of Frosif and posed as the wife of Haplif. During the plot to destroy the Chiss Ascendancy, Shimkif was responsible for keeping the Agbui's starship and crew in order.
